title: Faculty Development Program for Enhancing Instructional Design and Implementation Competencies in University Mathematics Teaching

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered program for novice instructors teaching mathematics to prospective elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Participants can apply a systematic framework to analyze learner needs when designing mathematics education.
Participants can integrate conceptual model-based instructional design principles into actual lesson development.
Participants can design and evaluate effective interaction strategies in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
